english.segment1: Well I know that this is real, because it passes what I feel. But Im feeling what I know and its unexplainable. And if you could feel that air, run through fields without a care. And the grass would blow on you well then you would know it too
english.segment2: But grass dies and night falls and skies cloud to dark. It seems that its different, but youre near so real so complete
english.segment3: And the air I breathe, so full, so deep. Forever so complete, forever so complete. The air I breathe, so full, so deep. Forever so complete, forever so complete
english.segment4: I could take you there, where you could feel that air. And the worlds could spin around, but its always, always found. When you feel that dear run through fields without a care. And the grass would blow on you and then you would know it too
english.segment5: But grass dies and night falls and skies cloud to dark. It seems that its different, but youre near so real so complete
english.segment6: And the air I breathe, so full, so deep. Forever so complete, forever so complete. The air I breathe, so full, so deep. Forever so complete, forever so complete
